import axios from "axios"; import { useState } from "react"; import Tab from "react-bootstrap/Tab"; import Tabs from "react-bootstrap/Tabs"; const backend_host="localhost"; const backend_port=1212; const Login = (props) => { const [authenticated, setAuthenticated] = useState(false); const [loginUsername, setLoginUsername] = useState(""); const [signupUsername, setSignupUsername] = useState(""); const [loginPassword, setLoginPassword] = useState(""); const [signupPassword, setSignupPassword] = useState(""); const [signupRepeatPassword, setSignupRepeatPassword] = useState(""); const login_submit = () => { const cred_json={username:loginUsername,password:loginPassword}; axios.post(`http://${backend_host}:${backend_port}/login`,cred_json).then((result)=>{ if (result.data.uid!=0) { props.do_login(result.data.uid) } }); }; const signup_submit = () => { if (signupPassword===signupRepeatPassword) { const cred_json = { username: signupUsername, password: signupPassword }; axios .post(`http://${backend_host}:${backend_port}/signup`, cred_json) .then((result) => { if (result.data.uid != 0) { props.do_login(result.data.uid); } }); } }; return (
